# Welcome! {.unnumbered}

This website shares result reports for the **Mentor Canada project**. This data science project is supervised under the [**Data Science for Social Good (DSSG)**](https://dsi.ubc.ca/data-science-social-good/2025) fellowhsip program at UBC's Data Science Institute.

In this website, you will find intermediate reports and progress milestones for our data science project.
